description: A code to be used by clients to handle the error.

enum.name: PASSWORD_RESET_VIA_EMAIL_REQUIRED
enum.description: The user's password must be reset via email.

enum.name: USER_CERTIFICATION_REQUIRED
enum.description: The user has not passed the certification process.

enum.name: INVALID_TABLE_QUERY_FACET_COLUMN_REQUEST
enum.description: At least one of the columns listed in a FacetColumnRequest is not facet-able according to the table's schema.
